trans-unit.target: 商業用途需要 Pro 許可證

完整版 - 專業版許可證

trans-unit.target: 是否確實要停用許可證？您需要輸入Pro許可證金鑰才能再次啟動它

trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是縮圖，請將其設置為相同的高度
調整大小以驗證移除訂單

trans-unit.target: 另存為自定義檢視名稱，以防止在程式更新時恢復預設檢視

trans-unit.target: 由於可用大小，某些元素被隱藏（根據刪除順序）

trans-unit.source: Click to copy Hardware ID to clipboard and open OneCommander.com
trans-unit.target: 按兩下將硬體ID複製到剪貼板並打開 OneCommander.com

trans-unit.source: Thank you for the purchase and supporting program development. Please restart the program to enable all features
trans-unit.target: 感謝您的購買和支援程序開發。請重新啟動程式以啟用所有功能

trans-unit.source: Couldn't open website. Open manually in web browser
trans-unit.target: 無法打開網站。在 Web 瀏覽器中手動打開

trans-unit.source: The license is valid for this computer only
trans-unit.target: 許可證僅對此計算機有效

trans-unit.source:
One Commander is free for HOME use with a limited features set.
For commercial use, the PRO license is required, regardless if the user needs these additional features (labeled with PRO in Settings).
trans-unit.target:
一個指揮官是免費的家庭使用，具有有限的功能集。
對於商業用途，無論使用者是否需要這些附加功能（在“設置”中標記為 PRO），都需要 PRO 許可證。

trans-unit.source: 1. Using the above button open the purchase page and paste the Hardware ID (it should already be on clipboard) and enter your email 2. After completing the purchase, you should receive an automatic email with activation code (check spam also) 3. Paste the license from the email into the field below
trans-unit.target: 1.使用上面的按鈕打開購買頁面並粘貼硬體ID（它應該已經在剪貼板上），然後輸入您的電子郵件 2.完成購買后，您應該會收到一封包含啟動碼的自動電子郵件（也請檢查垃圾郵件） 3. 將電子郵件中的許可證粘貼到下面的欄位中

trans-unit.source: 4. Restart program to activate all features
trans-unit.target: 4.重新啟動程式以啟動所有功能

trans-unit.source:
Before making a purchase, please make sure you are signed into Microsoft Store with an account that you'd like to associate with this purchase, so you can reinstall it in the future and on additional computers with the same account.
The license will be valid for up to 10 computers used with the same Microsoft Account (as defined in Microsoft Store policy)
trans-unit.target:
在進行購買之前，請確保你已使用要與此購買關聯的帳戶登錄到 Microsoft Store，以便將來可以在具有相同帳戶的其他電腦上重新安裝它。
許可證最多可對 10 台使用同一 Microsoft 帳戶（如 Microsoft Store 策略中所定義）的電腦有效

trans-unit.source:
Pro license is required to use in a commercial setting.
Please test it for a couple of days but if you find the program useful please purchase the license from the Microsoft Store (through About dialog)
trans-unit.target:
在商業環境中使用需要 Pro 許可證。
請測試幾天，但如果發現該程式有用，請從 Microsoft Store 購買許可證（通過“關於”對話框）

trans-unit.source: Couldn't find a valid license with the current Microsoft account. Please check your email for the original purchase receipt and then click the button below to log into the same account that was used to purchase the license.
trans-unit.target: 找不到具有當前 Microsoft 帳戶的有效許可證。請檢查您的電子郵件以獲取原始購買收據，然後按下下面的按鈕登錄到用於購買許可證的同一帳戶。

trans-unit.source: Please wait for the Microsoft Store...
Existing purchase verified. Please restart program to unlock all features.
trans-unit.target: 已驗證現有購買。請重新啟動程式以解鎖所有功能。

trans-unit.source: The purchase did not complete. You can complete the purchase anytime Microsoft Store is available.

trans-unit.target: 檔案清單中顯示的日期

trans-unit.source: Register as a default file manager

trans-unit.note: Confirmation after clicking to register as default file manager in settings

trans-unit.source: Proceed to terminate explorer.exe, delete Windows thumbnail cache files, and then restart explorer.exe? This will terminate all ongoing file operations!!!
trans-unit.target: 繼續終止資源管理員.exe，刪除 Windows 縮略圖緩存檔，然後重新啟動資源管理員.exe？這將終止所有正在進行的檔案操作!!!

trans-unit.source:
Important: This is an experimental feature that will edit your Registry to make One Commander the default file manager and folder handler (Open/Save dialogs cannot be replaced).
This will make Windows File Explorer unusable - even when clicking a folder in File Explorer the One Commander will open.
You will need to unregister it if you ever move or remove One Commander (uninstalling it will not reverse changes)!
This will also enable running in the background for faster window opening.
Are you absolutely sure you want to proceed and you know how to restore the registry on your own if something fails (no support in case of recovery)?
trans-unit.target: 重要說明：這是一個<bpt id=“1”><b></bpt>experimental feature<ept id=“1”></b></ept>，它將編輯註冊表以使 One Commander 成為預設的檔管理員和文件夾處理程式（無法替換打開/保存對話框）。<br/><bpt id=“2”><b></bpt>這將使Windows文件資源管理器不可用<ept id=“2”></b></ept> - 即使按兩下檔資源管理器中的檔夾，一個指揮官也會打開。<br/>如果您</bpt>移動或刪除一個指揮官（卸載它不會撤消更改），則需要<bpt id=“3”><b>註銷它<ept id=“3”></b></ept>（卸載它不會撤消更改）！<br/>這也將允許在後台運行以加快窗口打開速度。<br/>您是否絕對確定要繼續操作，並且知道如何在出現故障時自行恢復註冊表（在恢復時不支援）？
trans-unit.note: Message after clicking register as default file manager button in settings

trans-unit.source:
Do you want to restart program now to apply all changes?
This will cancel all ongoing operations initiated by One Commander
trans-unit.target: 是否要<bpt id=“1”><b></bpt>立即重新啟動程式<ept id=“1”></b></ept>以應用所有更改？<br/>這將取消由 One Commander 啟動的所有正在進行的操作
trans-unit.note: When closing settings window after changing settings requiring restart

trans-unit.source: Important: This is an experimental feature that will edit Windows Registry to completely replace Windows File Explorer Win+E hotkey. This registry change will make One Commander open when clicking Explorer shortcut, but won't disable navigation within Explorer. The only way to reverse this is unregistering it from One Commander or running the registry script from One Commander folder (uninstalling OC won't change it automatically). Proceed?
trans-unit.target: 重要提示：這是一個<bpt id=“1”><b></bpt>experimental feature<ept id=“1”></b></ept> 它將編輯Windows註冊表以完全取代Windows文件資源管理器Win + E熱鍵。此註冊表更改將使「一個指揮官」在按兩下資源管理器快捷方式時打開，但不會禁用資源管理器中的導航。扭轉這種情況的唯一方法是從One Commander註銷它或從One Commander資料夾運行註冊表腳本（卸載OC不會自動更改它）。進行？
trans-unit.note: Message after clicking register Win+E shortcut button in settings

trans-unit.source: Show popup asking to extract or open in a default program
trans-unit.target: 顯示要求在預設程式中提取或打開的彈出視窗

trans-unit.source: Downloads additional icons from onecommander.com if they are available. Check file icons dropdown after downloading.
trans-unit.target: 從 onecommander.com 下載其他圖示（如果可用）。下載后檢查檔圖示下拉清單。

trans-unit.source: Consistent: Drag always moves; Ctrl+Drag always copies
trans-unit.target: 一致：拖動始終移動;Ctrl+拖動始終複製

trans-unit.source: Inconsistent File Explorer way Drag moves if the same drive, otherwise copies. Ctrl+Drag to copy if the same drive. Shift+Drag to move to another drive.
trans-unit.target: 不一致的文件資源管理器方式 如果同一驅動器，則拖動移動，否則複製。Ctrl+拖動以複製（如果驅動器相同）。按住 Shift 鍵並拖動以移動到另一個驅動器。
排除的命令行管理程式上下文功能表項

trans-unit.source: Context menu items with these verbs or full-text will be excluded; comma separated; no space after comma; the pre-populated verbs/commands are not supported by One Commander
trans-unit.target: 包含這些動詞或全文的上下文功能表項將被排除在外;逗號分隔;逗號后沒有空格;一個指揮官不支援預先填充的動詞/命令
排除的觀察程序關鍵字

trans-unit.source: Changes in files with full-paths containing these strings won't be reported; Comma separated
trans-unit.target: 包含這些字串的完整路徑檔中的更改將不會被報告;逗號分隔
將滑鼠懸停在文件專案上
所選取檔案項目 將滑鼠懸停在

trans-unit.source: Choice between default or TeraCopy (must be already installed)
trans-unit.target: 在預設或 TeraCopy 之間進行選擇（必須已安裝）

trans-unit.source: Fix Stylus lag (breaks touchscreen double-tap to open)
trans-unit.target: 修復手寫筆滯後（斷開觸摸屏按兩下開啟）

trans-unit.source: Default OFF. If ON there will be no lag with graphic tablets, Wacom or Microsoft Surface stylus, but it will also disable double-tap (touchscreen) to open files (you would then need to use Single Click to Open folders option, and to open files by long-tap and Open from context menu). This is due to a bug in Microsoft WPF. Program restart required
trans-unit.target: 默認關閉。如果打開，圖形輸入板，Wacom或Microsoft Surface手寫筆不會有滯後，但它也將禁用按兩下（觸摸屏）打開檔（然後您需要使用單擊以打開資料夾選項，並通過長按和從上下文功能表打開檔）。這是由於 Microsoft WPF 中的一個錯誤造成的。需要重新啟動程式
以以下方式覆寫所有資料夾圖示：

trans-unit.source: Keep running in background (Close to System Tray)
trans-unit.target: 繼續在後台運行（靠近系統匣）

trans-unit.source: If On, program will stay in System Tray for faster next start. This should be enabled if program is set as a default file manager
trans-unit.target: 如果開，程式將保留在系統托盤中，以便下次啟動更快。 如果程式設置為預設檔管理員，則應啟用此功能

trans-unit.source: Restart required! Some languages are auto-translated using Microsoft Translator. If you would like to contribute to translating to your language, please write to support@onecommander.com
trans-unit.target: 需要重新啟動！某些語言是使用微軟翻譯自動翻譯的。如果您想為翻譯成您的語言做出貢獻，請寫信給 support@onecommander.com

trans-unit.source: Show text excerpts for these file types (Adaptive and Thumbs+Details file views)

trans-unit.source: Comma separated; no '.'; example: txt,bat,md; Content as ASCII/Plain-Text only
trans-unit.target: 逗號分隔;沒有“.”;例如：txt，bat，md;僅 ASCII/純文字格式的內容

trans-unit.source: If outside of C:\Users\YOURNAME\OneDrive; needed for additional synchronization status icons
trans-unit.target: 如果在 C：\Users\YOURNAME\OneDrive 之外;其他同步狀態圖示需要

trans-unit.source: If program has a window open, double-clicking its shortcut should
trans-unit.target: 如果程式打開了一個視窗，按兩下其快捷方式應

trans-unit.source: Show error report dialog on crash
trans-unit.target: 崩潰時顯示錯誤報告對話框

trans-unit.source: On crash a window will show where you can write steps to reproduce the crash so it can be fixed in the next update
trans-unit.target: 崩潰時，一個視窗將顯示您可以在哪裡編寫步驟來重現崩潰，以便在下次更新中修復它

trans-unit.source: Show file attributes and synchronization state icons
trans-unit.target: 顯示檔案屬性和同步狀態圖示

trans-unit.source: Required to show OneDrive status icons when Files on Demand is enabled. Shows also encrypted and reparse icons. Better performance when off.
trans-unit.target: 需要，以便在啟用「按需檔」時顯示 OneDrive 狀態圖示。還顯示加密和重新分析圖示。關閉時性能更佳。

trans-unit.source: If a folder contains a file named folder.jpg, cover.jpg, background.jpg or front.jpg, it will be loaded as its background image. Useful for music albums and movie posters
trans-unit.target: 如果資料夾包含名為 folder.jpg、封面.jpg、背景.jpg或正面.jpg的檔，則該資料夾將作為其背景影像載入。適用於音樂專輯和電影海報

trans-unit.source: Uses Windows Shell to get Folder Size. It is not 100% accurate but it is fast. Size format cannot be changed. Sorting folders by size is not possible. Higher CPU use
trans-unit.target: 使用 Windows Shell 獲取資料夾大小。它不是100%準確，但它很快。無法更改大小格式。無法按大小對資料夾進行排序。更高的CPU使用率

trans-unit.source: Show Folder size on network folders
trans-unit.target: 在網路資料夾上顯示資料夾大小

trans-unit.source: Off by default as it makes browsing network folders slower
trans-unit.target: 默認情況下處於關閉狀態，因為它會使瀏覽網路資料夾的速度變慢
顯示隱藏的檔案和資料夾

trans-unit.source: Off by default as it makes browsing network folders slower
trans-unit.target: 默認情況下處於關閉狀態，因為它會使瀏覽網路資料夾的速度變慢

trans-unit.source: Show warning dialog when changing extension during rename
trans-unit.target: 在重新命名過程中更改擴展名時顯示警告對話方塊

trans-unit.source: This will not affect folder size display (it is provided by Windows)
trans-unit.target: 這不會影響資料夾大小的顯示（由 Windows 提供）
在重新分析點內跳過搜索

trans-unit.source: Use this only if you know you have cyclical reparse points that would result in never-ending search. Checking this will break searching cloud drives as those rely on reparse points
trans-unit.target: 僅當您知道自己有迴圈的重新分析點會導致永無止境的搜索時，才使用此選項。檢查這一點將破壞搜索雲驅動器，因為這些驅動器依賴於重新分析點
始終按名稱對資料夾進行排序

trans-unit.source: If ON: Even if you sort files by date, folders will remain sorted by name
trans-unit.target: 如果設置為開：即使您按日期對文件進行排序，資料夾仍將按名稱排序

trans-unit.source: These settings won't affect folders that already have sorting saved
trans-unit.target: 這些設置不會影響已保存排序的資料夾
將資料夾保留在檔案上方
選項卡和我的最愛應顯示：

trans-unit.source: To create a custom theme: make a copy of a theme from \Themes folder and edit values in .xaml file
trans-unit.target: 創建自定義主題：從 \Themes 資料夾中複製主題，並在 .xaml 檔中編輯值
用於排除縮圖的檔擴展名

trans-unit.source: Restart program to apply. Better performance when off
trans-unit.target: 重新啟動要應用的程式。關閉時性能更佳

trans-unit.source: Acrylic effect is not available with Software rendering as it would be too slow (Check Advanced tab)
trans-unit.target: 亞克力效果不適用於軟體渲染，因為它太慢了（檢查高級選項卡）

trans-unit.source: Double-Click in empty space to open parent folder
trans-unit.target: 在空白處按兩下以打開父資料夾
使用高解析度觸控板滾動

trans-unit.source: Makes lines sharper on non-HDPI screens. Necessary only for 100% display scale. Program is more stable when Off, but icons and lines may not be as sharp. Default ON.
trans-unit.target: 使非 HDPI 螢幕上的線條更清晰。僅 100% 顯示比例才需要。關閉時程式更穩定，但圖示和線條可能不那麼清晰。默認打開。

trans-unit.source: Use old definition of Megabyte (as in Windows Explorer)
trans-unit.target: 使用兆位元組的舊定義（如在 Windows 資源管理器中）

trans-unit.source: Turn ON if you prefer using Mebibytes instead of Megabytes 1 Mebibyte = 2^20 bytes = 1048576 bytes (IEC) 1 Megabyte (MB) = 10^6 bytes = 1000000 bytes (SI standard)
trans-unit.target: 如果您更喜歡使用兆位元組而不是兆位元組，請打開 1 兆位元組 = 2^20 位元組 = 1048576 位元組 （IEC） 1 兆位元組 （MB） = 10^6 位元組 = 1000000 位元組（SI 標準）

trans-unit.source: Default OFF. Turn on if programs that used to accept drop operations from OC stopped accepting files. Please report if any program has issues with drop operations. Acrobat page-insert is known not to work with either.
trans-unit.target: 默認關閉。如果用於接受來自 OC 的刪除操作的程式停止接受檔，請打開。如果任何程式在放置操作方面存在問題，請報告。已知 Acrobat 頁面插入也不起作用。

trans-unit.source: This works only on a few versions of Windows 10
trans-unit.target: 這僅適用於Windows 10的幾個版本

trans-unit.target: 切換到打開一個指揮官的虛擬桌面

trans-unit.target: 將一個指揮官帶到當前虛擬桌面

trans-unit.source: Wait for all items before showing context menu
trans-unit.target: 等待所有項目，然後顯示上下文功能表

trans-unit.source: This will show slow items from SendTo submenu, but opening menu will take longer or cause freezing if send-to destinations are slow to respond, so it is off by default
trans-unit.target: 這將顯示 SendTo 子功能表中的慢速專案，但如果發送到目標的回應速度較慢，則打開功能表將花費更長的時間或導致凍結，因此預設情況下它是關閉的

trans-unit.source: Switch to newly created tab on middle-click on folder
trans-unit.target: 在中鍵按鍵單擊資料夾時切換到新創建的選項卡

trans-unit.source: Open paths from external source in:
For debugging purposes only. Program runs slower if enabled
trans-unit.target: 僅用於調試目的。如果啟用，程式運行速度較慢

trans-unit.source: Make size over 1 GB more prominent with a color
trans-unit.target: 使用顏色使超過 1 GB 的大小更加突出

trans-unit.source: Size shown in MB only, but MB text is not displayed
trans-unit.target: 大小僅以 MB 為單位顯示，但不顯示 MB 文字
trans-unit.note: Tooltip shown when mouse over MB file size option

trans-unit.source: Files view and sorting will be inherited from parent folder folder
trans-unit.target: 檔檢視和排序將從父資料夾資料夾繼承

trans-unit.source: The One Commander Connector is an experimental standalone utility to help connect OC with system Open and Save dialogs of other programs. A small window will appear under a compatible open/save dialog to let you set its folder to the path opened in One Commander. It runs independently from OC.
trans-unit.target: One Commander 連接器是一個實驗性的獨立實用程式，可説明將 OC 與其他程式的系統“打開”和“保存”對話框連接。一個小視窗將出現在相容的打開/保存對話框下，可讓您將其資料夾設置為在One Commander中打開的路徑。它獨立於 OC 運行。

trans-unit.source: Connector started. To test, close this settings window, open Notepad and then click File->Open to see it in action
trans-unit.target: 連接器已啟動。若要進行測試，請關閉此設置窗口，打開記事本，然後按兩下>打開“以查看其運行情況

trans-unit.source: This will download OneCommanderConnector.exe from OneCommander.com website. Since this utility starts with an invisible window and monitors when an Open or Save dialog window opens, an antivirus software may complain that it is suspicious. It is safe but if you have concerns please contact support.
trans-unit.target: 這將從 OneCommander.com 網站下載OneCommanderConnector.exe。由於此實用程式從不可見的視窗開始，並在打開或保存對話框視窗時進行監視，因此防病毒軟體可能會抱怨它是可疑的。這是安全的，但如果您有疑慮，請聯繫支持人員。
trans-unit.note: Dialog that opens when user clicks to download connector

trans-unit.target: 在工作列中顯示視窗名稱

trans-unit.source: Color item background to tag color
trans-unit.target: 為專案背景著色以標記顏色

trans-unit.note: Item as either File or Folder
Option to color items in settings
Option to color items in settings

trans-unit.note: Chown when settings, window, command shell is set to Custom

在資源管理員中打開回收站

trans-unit.source: Sliders auto-adjust range depending on the slider below it

As in position - in the middle

trans-unit.source: Determines where the file name will be trimmed when it cannot fit available space

trans-unit.target: Clears Windows global thumbnail cache (for Explorer also)

trans-unit.source: See \Resources\Scripts\ folder for examples. PRO users can have more than 8 scripts.
trans-unit.target: See \Resources\Scripts\ folder for examples. PRO users can have more than 8 scripts.

trans-unit.source: Know the scripts you are running! Security risk!
trans-unit.target: Know the scripts you are running! Security risk!

trans-unit.source: Use external One Commander updater program instead of PowerShell script
trans-unit.target: Use external One Commander updater program instead of PowerShell script

trans-unit.source: This enables a preview of Microsoft Office and some additional formats in the preview window (opened with spacebar) but due to a security vulnerability of the Explorer Preview of Office Files this is off by default. Enable at your own risk! Restart required.
trans-unit.target: This enables a preview of Microsoft Office and some additional formats in the preview window (opened with spacebar) but due to a security vulnerability of the Explorer Preview of Office Files this is off by default. Enable at your own risk! Restart required.

trans-unit.note: File age - short for day (ex: 1 d)
File age - short for hour (ex: 1 h 10')
File age - short for month (ex: 1 M)
For metadata - short for Second (ex: 30 s)
File age - short for year (ex: 1 y)

trans-unit.source: File {0} already exists in the destination folder. Replace all?
trans-unit.target: 目標資料夾中已存在檔{0}。全部替換？

trans-unit.note: Cursor drag text showing as part afer Move: Move | hold CTRL to Copy

trans-unit.source: Use ︿ ﹀ buttons on this divider to show/hide browser panes
trans-unit.target: 使用此分隔線上的〈 〉 按鈕顯示/隱藏瀏覽器窗格

trans-unit.source: Use ❮ ❯ buttons on this divider to show/hide browser panes
trans-unit.target: 使用此分隔線上的 ❮ ❯ 按鈕顯示/隱藏瀏覽器窗格

trans-unit.source: This is not a valid date format in .NET standard. Resetting to default
trans-unit.target: 這不是 .NET 標準中的有效日期格式。重置為預設值

trans-unit.source: Portable programs need a write access in their own folders so they cannot live in "Program Files" folder. Please move the entire folder to a non-system folder and run it again
trans-unit.target: 可移植程式需要在自己的資料夾中具有寫入許可權，因此它們不能位於「程式檔」 資料夾中。請將整個資料夾移動到<bpt id=“1”><b></bpt>非系統資料夾<ept id=“1”></b></ept>並再次運行

trans-unit.source: Please use only letters, numbers, and - or _
trans-unit.target: 請只使用字母、數位和 - 或 _

trans-unit.source: To close One Commander completely, hold CTRL while clicking the close button, or right-click the One Commander icon in System Tray (next to clock), and select Exit
trans-unit.target: 要完全關閉一個指揮官，<bpt id=“1”><B></bpt>單擊關閉按鈕時按住 CTRL<ept id=“1”></B></ept>，或右鍵單擊系統托盤中的一個指揮官圖示（時鐘旁邊），然後選擇<bpt id=“2”><i></bpt>Exit<ept id=“2”></i></ept>

trans-unit.source: Spacebar still works as Preview even when filtering files. Space cannot be used for filter
trans-unit.target: 即使在篩選檔時，空格鍵仍可用作預覽。空間不能用於篩檢程式

trans-unit.source: Icon packs updated. Look for new entries in file/folder icon pack selection boxes
trans-unit.target: 圖示包已更新。在檔/資料夾圖示包選擇框中查找新條目

trans-unit.source:
The file extension is different.
Do you want to add the original extension back so the file could be opened with the same associated program?
trans-unit.target: 檔擴展名不同。<br/>是否要<bpt id=“1”><B></bpt>將原始擴展名添加回去<ept id=“1”></B></ept>以便使用相同的關聯程序打開該檔？
trans-unit.note: Renaming - if user changes the original extension, they are asked to add original extension back. New: added line break after the first sentence

trans-unit.source: This path doesn't exist. Remove it?
This feature is available only in Pro version. Get the Pro version now?
trans-unit.target: 此功能僅在專業版中可用。<bpt id=“1”><b></bpt>立即獲取專業版？<ept id=“1”></b></ept>

trans-unit.source: When closing the last window, do you want the program to keep running in the background (icon in System Tray) for faster next start?
trans-unit.target: 關閉最後一個視窗時，是否希望程式<bpt id=“1”><B></bpt>保持後台運行<ept id=“1”></B></ept>（系統托盤中的圖示）以便更快地下一步啟動？

trans-unit.source:
You have changed the item name but clicked outside.
Do you want to always rename the file in this situation instead of canceling the operation?
trans-unit.target: 您已更改專案名稱，但按兩下了 outside。<br/>在這種情況下，是否要<bpt id=“1”><b></bpt>alway 重命名檔<ept id=“1”></b></ept>而不是取消操作？

trans-unit.source: Restart program as Admin? This will cancel all ongoing file transfers and other processes running through One Commander
trans-unit.target: 以管理員身份重新啟動程式？這將<bpt id=“1”><b></bpt>清除所有正在進行的文件傳輸<ept id=“1”></b></ept>以及通過One Commander運行的其他進程

trans-unit.source: Error updating program to new version
trans-unit.target: 將程式更新到新版本時出錯

trans-unit.source: Could not download the update. Full error is {0}
trans-unit.target: 無法下載更新。完全錯誤{0}

trans-unit.source: Can't fit both browsers at this window size. Switching to single browser view
trans-unit.target: 無法在此視窗大小下同時容納兩個瀏覽器。切換到單一瀏覽器檢視
複製到 Windows 剪貼板的選定內容

trans-unit.source: Detected Image on Clipboard. Press CTRL + V to Paste as a new PNG file
trans-unit.target: 在剪貼簿上檢測到圖像。按 CTRL + V 粘貼為新的 PNG 檔

trans-unit.source: New path on clipboard. Press Ctrl+Shift+T to open it in a new tab
trans-unit.target: 剪貼板上的新路徑。按 Ctrl+Shift+T 在新選項卡中將其打開

trans-unit.source: Detected Text on Clipboard. Press CTRL + V to create a new TXT file with this text
trans-unit.target: 在剪貼板上檢測到文本。按 CTRL + V 建立包含此文字的新 TXT 檔

trans-unit.source: Created an image file: {0} from Clipboard data
trans-unit.target: 已建立影像檔：從剪貼簿資料{0}

trans-unit.source: Created a text file: {0} from Clipboard data
trans-unit.target: 已建立文字檔：從剪貼簿資料{0}

trans-unit.source: Drag slower if you intend to move files
trans-unit.target: 如果您打算移動檔，請拖動較慢

trans-unit.source: Finished processing {0} file(s) from drop package
trans-unit.target: 已完成處理{0}從拖放包中的檔

trans-unit.source: Creating temporary files from drop package before the move...
trans-unit.target: 在移動之前從拖放包建立暫存檔案...

trans-unit.source: Drop operation cancelled - destination same as source
trans-unit.target: 刪除操作已取消 - 目標與源相同

trans-unit.source: Folder content changed but the path is too long for Windows to report. Refresh manually (F5)
trans-unit.target: 資料夾內容已更改，但路徑太長，Windows 無法報告。手動刷新 （F5）

trans-unit.source: Template created. Press Ctrl+N anytime to clone it to current folder
trans-unit.target: 已創建範本。隨時按 Ctrl+N 將其克隆到當前資料夾

trans-unit.source: New version is available. Press UPDATE button in the top-right corner
trans-unit.target: 新版本可用。按右上角的“更新”按鈕

trans-unit.source: Update available. You can update through Microsoft Store
trans-unit.target: 更新可用。您可以通過微軟商店進行更新
從 OneCommander.com 下載最新版本...

trans-unit.source: File with this name already exists. Do you want to replace it?
trans-unit.target: 具有此名稱的檔已存在。是否要替換它？
在選項卡歷史記錄中前進

trans-unit.source: Creates new Favorite group and adds current folder
trans-unit.target: 創建新的我的最愛組並添加目前的資料夾

trans-unit.source: Create a note in current folder
trans-unit.target: 在當前資料夾中創建便箋

trans-unit.source: CTRL + T to create | CTRL + W to close selected | CTRL + TAB to switch to next tab
trans-unit.target: CTRL + T 建立|CTRL + W 關閉選定的|CTRL + TAB 鍵切換到下一個選項卡

trans-unit.note: Button in New Window dialog to create the new window
Watermark in textbox to hold the name of the new window

trans-unit.target: 打開新視窗或保存的視窗

trans-unit.source: Path longer than Windows supported (260 characters) Some programs won't be able to open/save files from this folder
trans-unit.target: 路徑長度超過 Windows 支援的時間（260 個字元） 某些程式將無法開啟/儲存此資料夾中的檔案

trans-unit.note: For Ctrl+Shift+Enter to launch with params dialog

trans-unit.source: Creates and opens file in the default system program after cloning it
trans-unit.target: 克隆檔后，在預設系統程式中創建並打開檔

trans-unit.source: Creates copy of the selected template file with above filename in current folder
trans-unit.target: 在當前資料夾中創建具有上述檔名的選定範本檔的副本

trans-unit.source: Creates new folder in current folder and opens it
trans-unit.target: 在當前資料夾中創建新資料夾並將其打開

trans-unit.source: Creates new folder in current folder and moves selected items in it
trans-unit.target: 在當前資料夾中創建新資料夾並移動其中的選定專案

trans-unit.source: Creates new folder in current folder
trans-unit.target: 在目前的資料夾中創建新資料夾

trans-unit.source: To add new line press Ctrl + Enter
trans-unit.target: 若要添加新行，請按 Ctrl + Enter
備註 / 待辦事項任務
trans-unit.note: Title of the New Note dialog

trans-unit.target: 載入資料夾預覽時發生錯誤

trans-unit.source: Error loading folder preview. Windows doesn't support paths this long for some system operations
trans-unit.target: 載入資料夾預覽時發生錯誤。對於某些系統操作，Windows 不支援這麼長的路徑

trans-unit.source: File not available. Cloud files that aren't synced are not previewed, since they would have to be downloaded
trans-unit.target: 檔不可用。未同步的雲檔不會預覽，因為它們必須下載
在地圖上顯示照片位置
預覽修剪為前 {0}K 個字元

trans-unit.source: Search files starting from currently opened folder
trans-unit.target: 從當前打開的資料夾開始搜索檔

trans-unit.note: Message on shutdown screen - blocking to save settings

trans-unit.source: Sorts items by date modified (Newest first)
trans-unit.target: 依修改日期對項目進行排序（最新的在前）

trans-unit.source: Sorts items by date modified (Oldest first)
trans-unit.target: 依修改日期對項目進行排序（最舊的在前）
按名稱 （A-Z） 對項目進行排序
依名稱對項目進行排序 （Z-A）

trans-unit.source: Sorts files by size (Largest first); Folders are not sorted
trans-unit.target: 按大小對文件進行排序（最大優先）;資料夾未排序

trans-unit.source: Sorts files by size (Smallest first); Folders are not sorted
trans-unit.target: 按大小對文件進行排序（最小優先）;資料夾未排序
按類型 （A-Z） 對項目進行排序
依類型對項目進行排序 （Z-A）
將資料夾保留在檔案上方（開/關）

trans-unit.note: Item type in File Details - ex: Recycle Bin

trans-unit.source: TIP: User Ctrl + Mouse wheel to change thumbnail size / items per column
trans-unit.target: 提示：使用者按 Ctrl + 滑鼠滾輪更改每列的縮圖大小/項目數

trans-unit.source: In Preview you can use Mouse Wheel to zoom, even when previewing a video
trans-unit.target: 在預覽中，您可以使用滑鼠滾輪進行縮放，即使在預覽視頻時也是如此

trans-unit.source: TIP: You can draw selection-window by holding Middle-Mouse-Button without needing to use empty space
trans-unit.target: 提示：您可以通過按住滑鼠中鍵來繪製選擇視窗，而無需使用空白空間

trans-unit.note: Tooltip for update button on top-right corner

trans-unit.source: Folder name contains characters unsupported by Windows
trans-unit.target: 資料夾名稱包含 Windows 不支援的字元

trans-unit.source: No access. Try restarting as Admin (Ctrl+Shift+F12)
trans-unit.target: 無訪問許可權。嘗試以管理員身份重新啟動 （Ctrl+Shift+F12）

trans-unit.source: No WSL distros found. Make sure they are running
trans-unit.target: 未找到 WSL 發行版。確保它們正在運行

trans-unit.note: Clear menu item for History pane in sidebar
Menu item in Hostory pane in sidebar

trans-unit.source: History pane is removed. It can be added again in Settings
trans-unit.target: 歷史記錄窗格已刪除。可以在「設置」中再次添加
trans-unit.note: Message when user remves history pane by clicking menu item from the History pane in sidebar
Header in the flyout that opens on drag
Prepopulated text in New Folder dialog

trans-unit.source: Destination program doesn't accept FileDrop package
trans-unit.target: 目標程式不接受檔拖放包

trans-unit.note: Shown in dialog when settings have changed and window is being closed
As in certain folder is not available
When user chooses to delete window from New Window dialog

trans-unit.source: Items cannot be opened directly from the Recycle Bin. Restore them to the original folder first.
trans-unit.target: 無法直接從回收站打開專案。首先將它們還原到原始資料夾。
trans-unit.note: Message on double click on item in recycle bin

trans-unit.target: 從所選取內容中新建資料夾

trans-unit.note: Button in New folder from selection
Shows as pane title when listing changes in files for certain drive/disk

trans-unit.source: Refresh content (this type of folder cannot be auto-refreshed)
trans-unit.target: 更新內容（此類型的資料夾無法自動刷新）
trans-unit.note: Tooltip for refresh button for recycle bin and changes pane
Cursor label when file is dragged over exe or bat to Open with programName.exe

trans-unit.source: Windows is redirecting this folder. Files saved or edited here may not show outside OneCommander. This is Windows imposed limitation. Use standalone version of OneCommander for a proper access to this folder.
trans-unit.target: Windows 正在重定向此資料夾。在此處保存或編輯的檔可能不會顯示在 OneCommander 外部。這是 Windows 強加的限制。使用獨立版本的OneCommander來正確訪問此資料夾。
trans-unit.note: Warning message showing in Store version when browsing AppData

trans-unit.source: Windows doesn't support undoing file operations outside Explorer
trans-unit.target: Windows 不支援在資源管理器外部撤消檔操作

trans-unit.source:
Disk is full so settings cannot be saved. Clear at least a few KB of space or empty Recycle Bin.
Retry saving settings?
trans-unit.target:
磁碟已滿，因此無法保存設置。清除至少幾 KB 的空間或空的回收站。
重試保存設置？
